title: Mathematics Instructional Design Harmonizing STEM and Catholic Educational Values

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Course integrating STEM-based mathematical modeling with Catholic ethical values in simulation/VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify social responsibility issues and apply ethical judgment criteria when analyzing data in VR simulations
Learners can propose at least three evaluation criteria reflecting Catholic educational core values (common good, justice) in STEM project design
Learners can document cases of value conflict arising in their learning design through reflective interviews via formative assessment

resources: Catholic Social Teaching Educational Resource Kit

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
